title: Nikhiles and Dolly Mukhopadhyay Graduate Fellowship Fund
description: To provide graduate fellowship awards including tuition, school supplies, moving and travel expenses, etc. for students enrolled in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering at CU Boulder with preference for residents of India.
marketingContent: To provide graduate fellowship awards including tuition, school supplies, moving and travel expenses, etc. for students enrolled in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering at CU Boulder with preference for residents of India.
